QueryDefinition.Query: with a as ( select distinct m.patid AS PERSON_ID, m.fst_dt AS VISIT_START_DATE, CASE WHEN m.lst_dt IS NULL THEN m.fst_dt WHEN m.lst_dt < m.fst_dt THEN m.fst_dt ELSE m.lst_dt END AS VISIT_END_DATE, CASE WHEN ( m.rvnu_cd BETWEEN '0100' AND '0219' /*Room and Board Charges*/ OR m.rvnu_cd BETWEEN '0720' AND '0729' /*Labor Room and Delivery*/ OR m.rvnu_cd BETWEEN '0800' AND '0809' /*Inpatient Renal Dialysis*/ ) THEN CASE WHEN POS IN ('13','31','32','34') THEN 'LTC' ELSE 'IP' END WHEN ( m.pos IN ('23') OR m.rvnu_cd BETWEEN '0450' AND '0459' OR m.rvnu_cd = '0981' OR m.proc_cd IN ('99281','99282','99283','99284','99285') ) THEN 'ER' ELSE 'OP' END AS CLAIM_TYPE, m.prov,m.provcat, mp.[proc], mp.proc_position, CASE WHEN prov IS NOT NULL THEN LTRIM(ISNULL(cast(m.provcat as varchar), '')) + ';' + LTRIM(cast(m.prov as varchar)) ELSE NULL END as ProviderIdKey, m.Pat_PlanId, mp.icd_flag as proc_icd_flag, m.Units, m.procmod from {sc}.med_procedure mp JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND mp.patid = ch.PERSON_ID join {sc}.Medical_claims m on mp.patid = m.patid and m.pat_planid = mp.pat_planid and m.clmid = mp.clmid ), b as ( select *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY PERSON_ID, VISIT_START_DATE, VISIT_END_DATE, CLAIM_TYPE, ProviderIdKey, [proc] ORDER BY proc_position) AS RowNumber from a ) select * from b where RowNumber = 1 order by PERSON_ID
